name: github-actions-local-cache
description: A GitHub Action for local caching on runners

scripts.build: tsc && ncc build dist/main.js -o dist/main-bundle --source-map --license licenses.txt && ncc build dist/post.js -o dist/post-bundle --source-map --license licenses.txt && cp dist/main-bundle/index.js dist/main.js && cp dist/main-bundle/index.js.map dist/main.js.map && cp dist/post-bundle/index.js dist/post.js && cp dist/post-bundle/index.js.map dist/post.js.map
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint && npm run update-badge
